name: Little Party Legends
description:
Are you looking for a party game to play with family or friends? This is the game for you with up to 20 mini games!
Gather your family, friends or/and matchmake with other players in 3 different game modes up to 4-players.

GAME MODES

Quick Game - Play a quick mini game vs random players (solo or with friends).

Party Game - Play through shark island with alot of events and choose your path to reach the top of the mountain first to get the treasure chest (solo or with friends).

Quick Party - Just as "Party Game" but in increased speed (solo or with friends).

CHARACTERS
Buy cool characters in game as you gather your hard earned diamonds.

CHALLENGES
There are alot of different challenges that you can try to achive while playing the game.

ROOM CUSTOMIZATION
Buy items to your room and show your friends your cool looking room.

QUESTS/EVENTS
Try to complete the daily and weekly quests to get more diamonds!
